page.title: 04Clubs in Lorton
page.content: The under 5's are well established and draw members from Buttermere, Loweswater, Embleton,Wythop and Brandlingill. The Youth Club began three years ago and also includes members from neighbouring area. Full advantage is taken of fells, footpaths lakes and the playing field, for their various activities. THE Yew Tree Club caters mainly for the older and retired members of our area. The W.I. has been a part of village life for many years now. All these groups are based in the village hall and are supported by residents from this block. The Tennis Club is a flourishing group with three grass and a new hard court. The Caravan Club often takes advantage of our valley with organised rallies. Also welcome are the Scouting and Guide movement who camp in the Church field.
